product_name: Biore UV Aqua Rich Watery Essence
effects: Hydrating but not sticky and oily. Works well with my makeup, di nakakatunaw. I've tried many sunscreens kapalitan niyan throughout the years pero diyan talaga ko nabalik. No white cast din siya so di awkward tignan.
comment:
Skin type: Normal to Oily
Product Name: Biore UV Aqua Rich Watery Essence
Price and Size: Php 483/70g
Effects/Experience: Hydrating but not sticky and oily. Works well with my makeup, di nakakatunaw. I've tried many sunscreens kapalitan niyan throughout the years pero diyan talaga ko nabalik. No white cast din siya so di awkward tignan.
Status: HG ever since I tried it nung 2018!
matched_product: Biore UV Aqua Rich Watery Essence Sunscreen

effects: Haven't tried that many sunscreens in my life but this is my HG!!! No white cast, very smooth finish and super dewy looking. Lays amazing under makeup, there are times where I've skipped moisturizer before makeup and just used this. I prefer this one more over the regular whitening Belo sunscreen, that one is thicker, this one is thinner and truly makes ur skin look naturally dewy
comment:

product_name: Anessa Perfect UV Sunscreen Skin Care Milk SPF 50+
effects: easy to apply, no white cast, not sticky, and no heavy feeling on the skin. Goes well with my moisturizer and cushion. I don't need to reapply during the day. Very wearable during the summer.
